application.doc: Performing start, stop and restart operations on a server

param.name: operation
param.doc: The operation to be performed on the server. Valid values are start, stop, or restart.

param.name: handle
param.doc: ID of the server. Valid values are identitymanager, clustermanager, directoryintegrator.

method.name: POST
method.id: Performing start, stop and restart operations on a server
method.doc: To perform start, stop and restart operations on a server with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Server Widget's resource URI.
